intension: Create a stylish and eye-catching Facebook ad for a fashion sale featuring a young woman in blue clothing. The brand name is COIGHNY and they are offering a 35% off sale for today only. The ad includes the prices of various items such as Blouse Jeans for $75 to $87 and Skirt Shirt for $65 to $95. The original prices of some items were $85 to $115 and $75 to $152.
globalcaption: The image features a woman wearing a blue shirt and a blue skirt, standing in front of a blue background. She is holding a blue handbag, which is placed on her shoulder. The woman appears to be the main focus of the image, and she is surrounded by a few other people in the background. The scene seems to be a fashionable and stylish setting, possibly a store or a fashion event.
keywords: apparel, casual, clothes, fashion, fashionable, female, look, style, stylish, trendy, vogue, woman, blue, sunglasses, facebook, ad, fb, advertisement, sale

bglayer.bgcaption: The image features a woman wearing a blue shirt and a blue skirt. She is standing in front of a blue background, which complements her outfit.
